headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BOWDITCH, PHEBE A

snippet: BOWDITCH--Phebe A. The owners, executives, agents and staff of Brown Harris Stevens will miss our beloved colleague, who was a well-respected and successful member of the Real Estate Community. Phebe, who joined the firm in 1973, was truly a part of the fabric of the firm. She will be remembered for her dedication to her family and community, her wonderful turn of phrase, her stylish gloves and equestrian accomplishments. Our heartfelt sympathy is extended to her family and friends. 1/3
